messages.content: Your task is to translate natural language queries into Neo4j Cypher queries.
Name all the song performed in the year 1978
Your task is to translate natural language queries into Neo4j Cypher queries.
How many song was performed before 2000
Your task is to translate natural language queries into Neo4j Cypher queries.
Name of the singer performed in 1978 ?
Your task is to translate natural language queries into Neo4j Cypher queries.
Name of the person that sing Do Somethin' ?
Your task is to translate natural language queries into Neo4j Cypher queries.
Name of the person that perform more than 3 songs ?
MATCH (a:Artist)-[:PERFORMED]->(s:Song) WITH a, COUNT(s) AS numSongs WHERE numSongs > 3 RETURN a.name
